bdi4jade.core

Class MetadataElementImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • bdi4jade.core.MetadataElementImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MetadataElement
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AbstractBelief, AbstractPlan, NamedSoftgoal

    public abstract class MetadataElementImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements MetadataElement
    This class provides an implementation to the MetadataElement. It is able to store metadata.
    Author:
    Ingrid Nunes
